attributes.additional_details: This petition Is for free public transport for all service personnel, some students are getting 100% of their travel. Yes they get to travel for free. All our service personnel have to pay with little discount if they have their forces discount card, but I say that is not enough. Why should they have to pay to go home on a weekend to see their family? When they her fighting for queen and country. Finally a petition worth your time. Please sign.
